properties.name: CdnIdentifierSecret
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the secret in AWS Secrets Manager that is used for CDN authorization.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the secret in AWS Secrets Manager that is used for CDN authorization.

properties.name: SecretsRoleArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the IAM role that allows MediaPackage to communicate with AWS Secrets Manager.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the IAM role that allows MediaPackage to communicate with AWS Secrets Manager.

properties.name: LogGroupName
properties.description: Sets a custom AWS CloudWatch log group name for egress logs. If a log group name isn't specified, the default name is used: /aws/MediaPackage/VodEgressAccessLogs.

type.description: Sets a custom AWS CloudWatch log group name for egress logs. If a log group name isn't specified, the default name is used: /aws/MediaPackage/VodEgressAccessLogs.

properties.name: EgressAccessLogs
properties.description: The configuration parameters for egress access logging.

type.description: The configuration parameters for egress access logging.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A collection of tags associated with a resource

type.description: A collection of tags associated with a resource

properties.name: DomainName
properties.description: The fully qualified domain name for Assets in the PackagingGroup.

type.description: The fully qualified domain name for Assets in the PackagingGroup.
